name: art is too important not to share
name_original: art is too important not to share
description:
Instructions: Talk to the painter. WASD/arrow keys to move, spacebar to progress dialogue.

Made for Prototype Studio at the NYU Game Center. My prompt was a video with a bunch of shapeshifting triangles. So, here is a game about some restless triangles that change shape. My first attempt at using Bitsy!

*

*

*

This week I went to see a play- everything was meticulously designed and the actors were out there yelling, running into the audience, falling, eating dirt, you know, all that. During intermission, I overheard some conversations of people talking about it in the tone of "yeah, this is... kind of not bad. It's pretty good." I agreed and felt bad.

But sometimes that's how it goes! You work so, so, so hard and you make something that just contains all of your best ideas in their most polished form. And people go, "Oh. Yeah! Sure." And then they go home and never think about it again.
